extendedInfo.description: CycleProGo is an electronic charting app to assist with the practice of The Couple to Couple Leagueâs Sympto-Thermal Method of Natural Family Planning. This is the official Couple to Couple League (CCL) app and uses the approved CCL method. It allows couples to chart electronically, record symptoms, help determine their fertility status, and share charts with their teacher or friends. Charts and data can be accessed from multiple devices, so husband and wife can both be involved in charting. It can be used to track fertility signs or to assist in determining peak fertility as an aid to achieving pregnancy.All the fertility signs associated with CCLâs method can be recorded, including menstruation, temperature, mucus sensations and characteristics, and the cervix sign. CycleProGoâ¢ allows for recording LH ovulation test results, fertility monitor readings, weight, notes, and numerous other events including custom defined events. You can also login to CycleProGo.com via a web browser to print your charts and access even more features. Analysis Features:Â» NFP chartingÂ» Recording of fertility signs (mucus, temperature, and cervix)Â» Recording of events, notes, and other infoÂ» CCL method analysis to identify the fertile and infertile cycle phases (Phase I, II, and III)Â» Ability to select which Phase I and Phase III rules to useÂ» Cycle history Supported Symptoms: Â» Mucus (sensations and characteristics)Â» Temperature Â» Cervix Â» Menstruation Â» Fertility monitor Â» LH ovulation test results Â» More than 80 pre-programmed events (track health conditions, moods, medications, etc.)Â» Up to 20 custom (user-defined) events Other Features: Â» Password protection Â» Chart sharing with friends or your CCL teacher, and ability to see your teacherâs commentsÂ» Access data on more than one iPhone/iPadÂ» Access and print charts online at CycleProGo.com Â» Pregnancy due date estimators ( Naegle & Prem methods) Â» Data entry and viewing even without an internet connection (this is not just a web app) Â» No advertisements + To learn CCLâs method or to explore ways to learn NFP and register for a CCL class, please visit http://www.ccli.orgDisclaimer:This tool should not be used for medical purposes or as a substitute for medical advice. Actual performance and results are not guaranteed. Use at your own risk.

reviews.title: Great NFP App!
reviews.comment: This app is great to keep track of your cycles and confirm what you learned at an NFP class!  We use it every day!
reviews.author: Jeremy Roth

reviews.title: Super Excited to have a CCL App but...
reviews.comment: Love that CCL finally came out with this app, everything looks familiar and it works. A yearly subscription might be better than a monthly, but i wont say too much about that. My real comment/feedback is: can the developer PLEASE make the buttons bigger for the observation lists and menus??? They are very  slim and i find myself hitting the wrong thing even on my tablet. Thanks!!!
reviews.author: Angie Salicetti-Villamor

reviews.comment: Won\'t let you enter data unless you get a subscription for $5 a month. Doesn\'t say that in description. Total waste of my time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Well done!!
reviews.comment: We have been waiting for an app from CCL and here it is. User friendly and thorough. Highly recommended! (though we will still use paper charts for a little while)
reviews.author: Robert Demers

reviews.title: Sad
reviews.comment: I was hoping it was really a free app, even though a previous comment said it would not allow data entry without paying. They were right. It would have been better if they said that in the description.
reviews.author: Dusty Mansfield

reviews.title: Thanks CCL!
reviews.comment: Finally an app that really works, and uses the sympto-thermal interpretations! And doesn\'t assume ovulation on day 14! Thanks for all your hard work!
reviews.author: Alexi Dawson
